text: Antatah ti duvaile tyasa vrksabata kehi kha'ihale, jasako parinamasvarupa tiniharuka luka'une kura (gopya angaharu) tiniharuko agadi khulla bha'ihale ra ti duvaile aphana anga jannataka (svargaka) pataharule chopna thale ra adamale aphno palanakartako (adesako) ullaghanna gare ani margavicalita bha'ihale
